00016 //  This class used used in the list of potential critical points
00017 //  in basic image. They contain additional information about 
00018 //  neighbor sectors of critical point in case of restricted feed and
00019 //  sectors in which there'e a critical universal feed.
00020 //  This information is stored in field neighbors - appropriate bits
00021 //  are set.
00022 
00023

00031 #endif

00033   virtual char           *myName() const  { return "CriCandidate"; }
